title: Watch the Tulsa Tough livestream
content:
Catch all the action from Tulsa Tough this weekend via a free livestream from USACrits.tv. Just click play above.

We’ll drop results from each night’s pro races here throughout the weekend.

Tulsa Tough Blue Dome results

Women Pro/1/2:

1 – RYAN, Kendall L39ION of Los Angeles in 00:59:28.000
2 – SCHNEIDER, Skylar L39ION of Los Angeles
3 – MACPHERSON, Makayla LUX/Sideshow p/b Specialized
4 – LANGDON, Rachel InstaFund Racing
5 – EHRLICH, Emily CWA Racing p/b TREK

Men Pro/1

1 – WILLIAMS, Cory L39ION of Los Angeles in 01:14:46.000
2 – WILLIAMS, Tyler L39ION of Los Angeles
3 – MAGNER, Ty L39ION of Los Angeles
4 – WILLIAMS, Justin L39ION of Los Angeles
5 – MARTINEZ, Clever

For full results click over to the Tulsa Tough results site.
